name: Xanadu's Call
description:
Robot Jones has had enough with school! After getting revenge, he has taken Shannon hostage. Play as his robot nemesis, the heroic Matcha Man, as well as Ulgrid the prince of disco, a blue shopping cart, and Putt-Putt and Pep, on a quest to save the damsel in distress. Action, romance -- Xanadu calls!

[Tips: you can change the character order in the menu. This also changes who you see in the overworld.]

R.I.P. Olivia Newton-John! A queen...
